The most recent occurrence for me, it felt like someone was grabbing my head and screaming in my ear and I couldn't get them off me but my brain was fully awake.
It's always an odd thing to talk about and try to explain.
I helped her lol. I went through all the cowboy-type romances until she found the perfect one

I used to work at Barnes Noble and this lady would always come in looking for very specific things in the romance section.
One day, one of the questions was "do you have something along the lines of a cowboy being sort of dominated by a biker chick? I think I saw something like that before."

WRITING.TITLE: I found old clothes that my mom used to make my dog wear. I put a dress on my cat and he just ended up looking like Fetty Wap in a Hawaiian shirt.
